flawed_nl_solution:
Originally, the houses are 7300+5200=<<7300+5200=12050>>12050 sq. ft. in total.
The smaller house will be expanded by 16000-12050=<<16000-12050=3950>>3950 sq. ft.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12500, not 12050. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
